note.p: Education: Bonn; Athens; Copenhagen. PhD (1848, Bonn)
Career: In charge of teak forests of Burma and saved them from destruction (1856-1862); Inspector General of Forests to the Government of India (1864); retired (1883)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1908 vol 80 pp iii-vi signed by W S
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
